posts.title: Bio
posts.text: Hi, I am a senior student at Zhejiang University, majoring in information engineer. During my undergraduate years, I had the privilege of delving into the fascinating world of Artificial Intelligence (AI). It was a phase of my academic journey that not only broadened my horizons but also ignited a deep passion for the field. My researh interest is broadly about natural language processing. Currently, I’m fortuate to be co-advised by Prof. Hongyuan Mei and Prof. Karen Livescu at TTIC . I am applying for MS/Phd programs in Fall 2024.
